title: Flexible Blended Learning-Based Program for Enhancing Workplace Mathematics Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level mathematics fundamentals and basic job-related calculation skills
context.additional_context: Customized design reflecting working learners' schedules and learning needs. Provision of a practical problem-solving environment through VR simulation

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world work scenarios in a VR environment and apply mathematical modeling techniques.
Learners can autonomously combine online content (60%) and face-to-face workshops (40%) to develop a blended learning plan.
Through team-based project assessments, learners can solve data analysis problems encountered in work settings using mathematical methods and write reports.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
